name: Mega Skater Boulzor Turbo Deluxe
description:
Mega Skater Boulzor Turbo Deluxe is the very first SAUSAGE EXTREME SKATEBOARDING GAME.

You were looking for something like this? LOOK NO FURTHER! THIS SHIT IS FUCKING AMAZING.

It's so cool, it made spanish kids play it! And they made Let's plays!

Just play it, okay?
